Question: Guangzhou Hanle Electrical Industrial Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Guangzhou Hanle Electrical Industrial Co., Ltd

Product: QLED Ultra Slim Screen Smart TV

- Sizes: 55'', 58'', 75'', 82''
- QLED Technology: Utilizes quantum dot technologies for better brightness and wider chromatography
- Spectral Highlight: Provides brighter and more conspicuous images
- Slim Design: Ultra-slim screen design for a sleek look
- Smart TV Features: Offers smart TV functionalities for enhanced user experience
Summary_cn:
广州汉乐电器工业有限公司

产品：QLED超薄屏幕智能电视

- 尺寸：55英寸，58英寸，75英寸，82英寸
- QLED技术：采用量子点技术，提供更好的亮度和更宽广的色彩范围
- 光谱亮点：提供更亮更显眼的图像
- 超薄设计：超薄屏幕设计，展现时尚外观
- 智能电视功能：提供智能电视功能，提升用户体验
